about_the_game:
Enter a World of Awe-Inspiring Magic and Intense Battles


Arcane Arena is an exhilarating multiplayer action game that thrusts you into a world of awe-inspiring magic and intense battles. Engage in epic team-based combat as you harness the power of arcane forces to dominate the battlefield. With a diverse roster of unique spellcasters, each wielding their own set of devastating abilities, it's up to you and your teammates to coordinate, strategize, and claim victory.

Choose Your Spellcasting Specialist


Choose your class from a captivating selection of spellcasting specialists. Become a Necromancer and summon hordes of undead minions to overwhelm your foes. Manipulate the fabric of time as a Chronomancer, altering the course of battles to your advantage. Brew potent potions and unleash explosive attacks as an Alchemist. Command the elements as an Elementalist, raining down fiery destruction or freezing enemies in their tracks. With each class offering a distinct playstyle and a wide array of spells and abilities, the possibilities for magical mastery are endless.

Teamwork and Coordination


Teamwork and coordination are crucial in Arcane Arena. Coordinate with your teammates to capture control points, escort valuable artifacts, or defend ancient relics. Forge powerful alliances, communicate strategies, and combine your abilities to unleash devastating combos that will leave your enemies in awe. With dynamic environments and interactive elements, the battlefield is a canvas waiting for your magical touch. Adapt your tactics, utilize environmental advantages, and outmaneuver your opponents to secure victory.

Path to Glory


Progress and grow as a spellcaster by earning experience points and unlocking new abilities as you level up your chosen class. Customize your appearance with a wide range of cosmetic items, including unique skins, emotes, and weapon enhancements. Show off your individual style and prowess as you carve your path to glory.

Rise to the Top


For those seeking a competitive edge, ranked matches offer a thrilling arena to test your skills against other formidable spellcasters. Climb the leaderboards, earn prestigious ranks, and become a legend of the Arcane Arena.

Immerse yourself in the mystical realm of Arcane Arena, where magic reigns supreme and battles of epic proportions await. Prepare to be mesmerized by stunning visuals, exhilarating gameplay, and the thrill of wielding arcane powers. Are you ready to rise as a master of magic and conquer the Arcane Arena? Let your journey begin!

content_descriptors.notes: Arcane Arena contains general violent content in a stylized, cartoon graphics style. Violence is not realistically portrayed.

name: Arcane Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version 1909 revision .1350 or higher, or versions 2004 and 20H2 revision .789 or higher.
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8650
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 600 series, AMD Radeon™ HD 7000 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version 1909 revision .1350 or higher, or versions 2004 and 20H2 revision .789 or higher.
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060/ GeForce® GTX 1650 or AMD R9 380/AMD RX 6400
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Arcane Arena is an intense multiplayer action game chosen from diverse spellcasting classes, each with unique abilities. Engage in team-based combat, and dominate the battlefield. Unleash devastating spells, manipulate time, summon creatures, and harness elements to emerge victorious.
